text: Hubert Humphrey unsuccessfully ran for president thrice: *Hubert Humphrey presidential campaign, 1952, the failed campaign Hubert Humphrey conducted in 1952 *Hubert Humphrey presidential campaign, 1960, the failed campaign Hubert Humphrey conducted in 1960 *Hubert Humphrey presidential campaign, 1968
title: Hubert Humphrey presidential campaign
